title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, February 8, 2020
description: It’s the 96th birthday of translator and poet Lisel Mueller (1924), who said, “There is a double satisfaction in being someone else and still being myself.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the 96th birthday of translator and poet Lisel Mueller (1924), who said, “There is a double satisfaction in being someone else and still being myself.”
